name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @travisamex It's not the weather. It's also gross incompetence. Understaffing. Crew forgetting to load bags. Don't duck truth.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @Stone9956 Do you dislike delays when they're caused by YOUR crew forgetting to load bags & lazy pilot wanting duty day to end?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @ShannonBloom Where's my DM? Where's my voucher? Who's paying my $70 cab and my $50 car back to JFK tomorrow?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @yvonneokaka When do I get my personal response and apology for your crew's having forgotten to load baggage onto my flight?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @brewcrewfan8 Is this real life AA? Like 2015 real life? You should be emailing/calling/DMing people you've inconvenienced.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @ActingOutMgmnt Just make sure they remember to load the bags onto the plane. They Cancelled Flight the flight when they forget...

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @marxsterbcow How is this a real life response to a customer service issue? Seriously. Keep trying to call us. Eh might work.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @tennetexan Too bad there's only like 3 people on that team then. Because this is next level unreal.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @CAexhibitions Sorry in like a general way? Or sorry that incompetence/understaffing is compounding weather issues?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @sweetmel If weather is bad wouldn't your folks try extra hard to communicate...or load bags onto flight 1320...or...anything?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir Cool a canned response. Nah I think I'll keep tweeting at everyone who mentions AA on Twitter. You could DM me though.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @russelneiss No American. This is simple. How about YOU call HER back with the info for her new flight. Basic customer service

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @ejacqui If you updated the screens then people would know the Late Flightst info good or bad. And that wouldn't work because...

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @_emmaclifford No. At JFK you sort of have to guess things out. It's a small airport so whatever.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @BDinDallas The personal touch you're known for AA. Other cool perks: blaming understaffing on weather. And 3 hr hold times.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @naomi_cooper Are you out of your mind AA? What is the point of this Twitter acct? Form letters in 140 characters or less?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @cheerUPDATES So you're saying the call center is understaffed?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @GolfWithWoody Don't buy it Woody. They're making it MUCH worse with understaffing rudeness and pre-rookie mistakes

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir I did. Should i expect a response in this fiscal year? This calendar year? Never?

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @JimDayTV no you couldn't care less. That's why their customer service is run by bots

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @sarahzou translation: we don't reinvest our mammoth profits into the customer service experience. 'Cause we don't care.

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @ezemanalyst why don't you tweet canned impersonal responses as though this is the only impatient customer you've got

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @manuel_c "here for you" as in yeah we'll tweet platitudes at you so you'll think our Twitter bot cares? Or....

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @PatrichRuben no profit maximization is your top priority. Nothing else even registers for you dinosaurs

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @kaps12 this is an international airline that experienced record profits last quarter. But they can't staff a call center

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @cjdjpdx not a valid response in 2015 for a multinational corp whose profits are measured in billions. Stop understaffing!

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @jameswester see James we only have 7 dedicated inbound phone lines because telephones eat into our billions in profits

name: otisday
text: @AmericanAir @praywinn between understaffing what looks like a labor slowdown weather incompetence and disregard for the customer...
